attributes.action: Ban lorries from overtaking each other on dual carriageway and motorways.
attributes.additional_details: Lorries (trucks) should not be overtaking each other, as they are very slow (56 mph) and delay our journeys in vehicles such as cars and vans. It is also dangerous, causes traffic jams and increases pollution.
attributes.background: Pass a law that prevents lorries from overtaking one another on dual carriageways and motorways, following the examples of the Czech Republic and Germany.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Restrict lorries to the left lane on dual carriageways and motorways 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/706409
